name: Marcus Johnson
training_history: 6 years consistent strength training. Ran 5/3/1 for 2 years, PPL for 1 year, currently stalled on a bro split for 6 months.

must_include: periodization change from his current approach (not just bro split)
rotation system (A/B/C blocks with sagittal, frontal, posterior emphasis)
progressive overload with wave loading or DUP
Nordic curl progression in every session
deload every 4th week with 40-50% volume reduction
must_progress: isometric progression: yielding → overcoming → functional → reactive
intensity and complexity increase across 3 phases
home gym creative substitutions for cable/machine movements

expected_coach_interactions.user_message: Why am I doing split squats instead of back squats? I can squat 180kg.
expected_coach_interactions.expected_behavior: Coach should explain the methodology (unilateral focus, rotation system benefits) without being condescending to an experienced lifter. Acknowledge his strength level.

expected_coach_interactions.user_message: Can I skip the warm-up and mobility stuff? I just want to lift.
expected_coach_interactions.expected_behavior: Coach should explain why it matters for his goals (breaking plateau requires movement quality, not just load) but respect his experience. Not preachy.
